channel.title: News on Heathen Foray - Melodic Death Metal from Austria
channel.description: Recent content in News on Heathen Foray - Melodic Death Metal from Austria

item.title: Weltenwandel released
item.description: The day has finally come! Today our new album “Weltenwandel” is released to the world! You can buy or stream the album on all major platforms: Bandcamp Spotify Amazon Google Apple Music Listen to our single “Tanz” on YouTube

item.title: New single released
item.description: Today marks the release of the very first single of our upcoming album “Weltenwandel”. The song is called “Tanz” and you can watch the music video on YouTube starting now! Watch “Tanz” on YouTube

item.title: Artwork revealed
item.description: Our new album “Weltenwandel” will hit the stores on February 21st! The first single drops on January 28th, and the album will be available for pre-order soon! Here is the cover artwork:

item.title: New single coming
item.description: We will release a new single on May 7th! The name will remain a secret for the time being. Here is the cover artwork:

item.title: New album coming
item.description: The long wait will soon be over! We will release our 5th studio album on 21st February 2020 through Massacre Records The album will be called “Weltenwandel” and the artwork and track list will soon be released.

item.title: New Merch available
item.description: As you know, we recently updated our logo a bit. Only makes sense to also issue some new merchandise to go with it, right? We have produced a t-shirt and sweatshirt sporting the new logo and symbol! Head over to our merchandise shop to pickup yours: Heathen Foray Merchandise Shop

item.title: Time for something new
item.description: For many years, we used our classic Heathen Foray logo. However, times are changing and so are we. From this day forward, we will be using a new logo. Why a new logo you ask? Well, maybe we needed something with more spikes for our upcoming album. Soon we will reveal more!

item.title: What happens on tour? #5
item.description: Come with us on the third day of our three day tour! Today we are conquering Brno. Subscribe to our YouTube channel to not miss any future episodes! Watch day 3 of the tour here

item.title: What happens on tour? #4
item.description: Come with us on the second day of our three day tour! Today we are conquering Frostfeurnächte festival. Day 3 will be out next week. Subscribe to our YouTube channel to not miss it! Watch day 2 of the tour here

item.title: What happens on tour? #3
item.description: Come with us on the first day of our three day tour! Today we are conquering Vienna. Day 2 will be out next week. Subscribe to our YouTube channel to not miss it! Watch day 1 of the tour here

item.title: Tour announcement
item.description: Come see us live: Feb 2019 VIPER ROOM, Vienna, Austria Feb 2019 FROSTFEUERNÄCHTE, Heidesee, Germany Feb 2019 HEATHEN ASSAULT OVER BRNO, Brno, Czech Republic Find more info and tickets at the Facebook events links above!

item.title: Armored Bards Re-Release
item.description: We are super happy to announce, that our second album “Armored Bards” is back in stores and on streaming platforms. Download or stream it NOW! Bandcamp: https://heathenforay.bandcamp.com/album/armored-bards Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/album/0cC2vZRtKzmXgBPGeuKtmX Amazon: https://www.amazon.de/dp/B07HHG5SZG/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1537433402&sr=8-1&keywords=heathen+foray+armored+bards iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/armored-bards/1436714930?app=itunes&ign-mpt=uo%3D4 Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/music/album/Heathen_Foray_Armored_Bards?id=Btczw2ijhdoiqcivuiiuubouseu Napster: https://us.napster.com/artist/heathen-foray/album/armored-bards-808719-records-dk Tidal:https://tidal.com/browse/album/95334736

item.title: Win The Passage Limited Edition and more
item.description: After re-releasing our very first album “The Passage” last week, we want you to have a chance of winning what we call “The Package”. It includes the limited edition “The Passage” digipak, a T-Shirt (size can be chosen by you after winning), a button and a sticker. You can find “The Passage” here at our Bandcamp page. You can win by entering the raffle below. Win by taking the actions described, and remember the more actions you take the greater your chances of winning!

item.title: The Passage Re-Release
item.description: We are super happy to announce, that our very first album “The Passage” is back in stores and on streaming platforms. This album won “Best Austrian Newcomer 2009 (folkmetal.at)” and was nominated for “Best Pagan-Album 2009 (metalstorm.net)”. Download or stream it NOW or Robert will come and find you! Watch the video on YouTube

item.title: QnA #1 with Heathen Foray
item.description: We are trying something new today: Answering your questions through a YouTube video. You want your questions answered in our next Q&A video? Leave a comment! Watch the video on YouTube

item.title: New Line-Up revealed
item.description: It has been far too long. We have returned from our slumber with a new line-up and are ready to bring Heathen Foray back on stage very soon. We are happy to announce, that Heathen Foray founder Jürgen has returned! He will continue his duties on guitars and will be heavily involved in the creation process of our upcoming 5th studio album. Jürgen played a major role in the songwriting of “The Passage” and “Armored Bards” and we know that you will love the songs he has already written for our next album.

item.title: Crowdfunding for upcoming album
item.description: We started a Crowdfunding Project for our upcoming Album. https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/heathen-foray-album-release-2015

item.title: Inner Force is released
item.description: Our new CD, called “Inner Force” is now available for purchase: http://heathenforay.bandcamp.com/

item.title: New release comming
item.description: We are proudly announcing some real news! The new year will bring a new CD! We will rush into the studio right from the first weeks of 2013! During the next weeks we will provide you more details!

item.title: Line-Up change
item.description: Jürgen and Franz will leave the band due to professional reasons.We wish both of them all the best for the future. Replacements for both were already been found. If you want to see Heathen Foray for one last time in this lineup: The last show with the recent lineup will be on the 29th October at the Kulturhalle Lafnitz. This will be our “Farewell” show for Jürgen and Franz.

item.title: We have a winner
item.description: An we have a winner! Florian Langeder wins our fan-package. Congratulations! We will be in touch with you very soon.

item.title: Black Trolls in Traun, Austria
item.description: We will play a guest show on the upcoming Black Trolls Over Europe Tour. See you next week in Traun, Austria! http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=132280636839791

item.title: 5th anniversary show in Graz
item.description: This year Heathen Foray celebrates its 5th anniversary! For this special occasion we will play a show in Graz on 25th March 2011 at the Explosiv. Also playing are Exanimalis, Sweet Sorrow, Menneskeeter and Bloodfeast. Tickets are available at the bands!

item.title: Competition starts today!
item.description: Today starts our fan competition! Go to our Facebook-Page and post your ultimate Heathen Foray picture. The one that gets the most “likes” until the 6th January 2011 will win the competition. The crazier the better. The more creative your picture is the bigger the chance to win the ultimate Heathen Foray fanpackage: Limited Edition “Armored Bards” T-Shirts “Armored Bards” A piece of Robert’s stageoutfit Tourplecs used and played by our guitarists Setlist of Heidenfest 2010 and Black Trolls Over Europe Tour (used on stage) One of Franz’s drumheads (signed by the band) Parts of Max’s stageoutfit You do not have your own Facebook-Profile?

item.title: Fan competition
item.description: Before this year comes to an end we will have a competition for you all. This competition offers prices that every fan will love - among the prices are items that can’t be bought in shops. The rules to enter the contest will be posted soon! A little tip: You should be our friend on Facebook to enter the contest.

item.title: Livevideos from Black Trolls tour
item.description: We released three videos of our gig in Uster (Switzerland)! You can find the links to the videos here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCt7nX-8clzcc4pI_YPNaP5Q

item.title: On Tour
item.description: For all of you who want to see us on the “Black Trolls over Europe” Tour: We will play as second or third band. We are looking forward to you!

item.title: Tickets for 2nd October
item.description: You can now get into our albumreleasegig on 2nd October on a special price. Just write an E-Mail, Facebook-, Twitter- or MySpace-Message and you will only pay 7 Euros for entrance.

item.title: Live at Heidenfest
item.description: As special bonus to our album-release on 24th September, we will be playing as Special-Guest at the Heidenfest in Vienna on 25th September. We will share the stage with Ensiferum, Equilibrium, Twiglight of the Gods and Swashbuckle. http://www.heidenfest.eu

item.title: Limited edition
item.description: You can listen to the third sample of our new album “Armored Bards” right here. This song is the opener-track and is also called “Armored Bards”. Furthermore, we can give you information on the Limited Edition of the album. This edition will be released in a wooden box incl. patch, signed picture and the original CD. Also, it will be limited to 400 and will only be available at concerts.

item.title: Albumtrailer
item.description: Watch the trailer for our upcoming album “Armored Bards” on our YouTube channel.

item.title: STP Metal Weekend Tickets
item.description: Tickets for the STP Metal Weekend on 17./18. September are available for 12 Euros. If you are interested, just send us a message.

item.title: Second sample online
item.description: Today we present you the second sample of our upcoming album “Armored Bards”. You can download “Bifrost” here.

item.title: Second sample online
item.description: Now you can download a sample of the song “The Blight” from our new album “Armored Bards”.

item.title: Armored Bards
item.description: The wait is over! Here are all the infos about our new album “Armored Bards”. The new album will contain 10 songs and 1 video clip. It will be released as a normal CD and a “Limited Edition”! Until the release on 24th September 2010 we will be releasing samples of the songs. The first sample will follow shortly.

item.title: Albumrelease show
item.description: Our new album will be released on the end of september. Therefore, we will be hosting a special gig to celebrate this event together with our good friends of Perishing Mankind. They also will present their new album on this date. The gig will be on the 2nd of October 2010 at the new Explosiv in Graz. We will perform new material from the new album there for the first time.

item.title: Black Trolls over Europe Tour
item.description: Together with Black Messiah, Negura Bunget, Nomans Land, Adorned Brood, Dyrathor and Wolfchant we will play the “Black Trolls over Europe”-Tour this October. Here are the dates: 08.10.2010 DE, Bonn, Klangstation 09.10.2010 DE, Gera, Sächsischer Bahnhof 10.10.2010 DE, Darmstadt, Steinbruchtheater 11.10.2010 DE, Flensburg, Roxy 12.10.2010 DE, Hamburg, Headbeangers Ballroom 13.10.2010 DE, Essen, Turock 14.10.2010 DE, Ludwigsburg, Rockfabrik 15.10.2010 CH, Uster, Stadhofsaal 16.10.2010 DE, Ruhla, Waldeshall Festival 17.10.2010 NL, Rotterdam, Baroeg

item.title: Finished recording
item.description: A few days ago, we finished recording vocals for our new album. The vocals were the last item to record. The material is now being mixed and we are looking forward to release the new album this October.

item.title: Ragnarök / Fiesta Pagana Stagetimes
item.description: After receiving tons of mails concerning our stagetimes for this weekend, we can finally post the official times for you: Friday - 30th April - RAGNARÖK FESTIVAL: 1:40 pm Saturday - 1st May - FIESTA PAGANA: 3:15 pm

item.title: New album
item.description: Yesterday, we started the recording of our next, still unnamed, album at the Rockstudio. The album will be containing 10 new songs and will be released in October 2010. Until then, we will inform you here about our progress. So stay tuned!

item.title: Nominated for best pagan album
item.description: After you already made us “Best Newcomer 2009”, you now have the chance to get us “Best Pagan-Album 2009”! The biggest international metalzine metalstorm.ee has nominated us, together with Ensiferum, Tyr etc., for best Pagan-Album 2009. You can vote here if you register at metalstorm.ee!

item.title: We win newcomer award 2009
item.description: The votes are counted: Heathen Foray wins with a majority of votes in Folkmetal.at’s “Best Newcomer 2009” voting. We want to thank all of you who voted for us! There is yet a lot to come in 2010.

item.title: Attention Switzerland
item.description: We start the new year with our first gig in Switzerland ever! Our fans can see us on the 29th January at the Met-Bar in Lenzburg. http://www.met-bar.ch

item.title: Nominated for best newcomer
item.description: Heathen Foray was nominated in the category “Newcomer 2009” of Folkmetal.at’s voting of the best Folk-Bands. You can now vote for us here. http://www.folkmetal.at

item.title: Mini Tour
item.description: After our tour with Battlelore, we continue touring this year with a small 4 date tour in december. We will be playing Germany from the 27th till the 30th december with Nomans Land and Obscurity. 27.12 Black Troll Winterfest, Zeche Carl, Essen 28.12 Pagan Winterfest, Bad Salzungen 29.12 Gleis3, Annaberg-Buchholz 30.12 Sächsicher Bahnhof, Gera

item.title: Tourreport
item.description: Our friends of Stormbringer.at have posted our tourreport. You can find it here. http://www.stormbringer.at/specials.php?id=74

item.title: Changes in tourdates
item.description: The tourplan with Battlelore changed a little bit today. Instead of the show at the Orpheum (Graz, Austria) we will be playing an additional show at the Kreuz (Ottweiler, Germany). For all our fans that wanted to see us live in Graz, we offer special tickets for our show at the Kulturkeller (Gleisdorf, Austria). Just contact us an we will arrange those tickets for you.

item.title: On tour with Battlelore
item.description: We are happy to tell you that we will be accompanying BATTLELORE on their Northern Crown Tour this November through Austria and Germany. You can find the tourdates under LIVE. Additionaly, our forum was relaunched is ready for your questions! All users of testphase are welcome to register again.

item.title: Woodstone Festival
item.description: This year’s Woodstone Festival again takes place in Stallhof bei Stainz. The ticketprice is a voluntary donation to fighting childcancer. Don’t miss your chance to see a whole bunch of excellent bands for very low price. Heathen Foray supports this noble cause of fighting childcancer. So there is no reason for you to not come to the show on the 1st of august!

item.title: Live on air
item.description: On friday the 25th Mai 9-10pm (MET), Markus and Jürgen will be guests on Metallic Underground Radio. They will talk about our new album “The Passage” and introduce some songs. You can also win some “The Passage” CDs!

item.title: First sample of new album
item.description: “The Passage” reaches the end of it’s production-phase. You better mark the 24th April 2009 in your calender! The album will be officially released on this date. Until then, we will post some samples of “The Passage” on the web. Today, the first song is online!

item.title: Band of the month
item.description: This month has a lot to offer for Heathen Foray fans! Austrian metalzine Darkscene features us in this months top-story with an interview and an exciting review (8/10). Furthermore, we are officially “Band of the Month” on Metalfabrik.net

item.title: The Passage release
item.description: Today is the release of our new album “The Passage”. You can now download a new song (Dragon’s Eyes) from our website! We have also gathered the first reviews for you: Legacy 10/14 MetalHammmer 4.3/7 RockHard 7,5/10 Metalstorm 8.3/10 Osnametal 4/5 MetalMessage 8/10 InnJoy 8/10 HardHarderHeavy 6/7 Hell is Open 8.5/10 Schwermetall 9/13 Stormbringer 4/5 You can find them here!

item.title: Signed with Black Bards Entertainment
item.description: Well, after weeks of being forced to silence we can now tell you why it was so quiet on this website. We have officially signed a europewide record-deal with the german label Black Bards Entertainement. We now also get professionel assitance when it comes to booking…so we will definately play even more gigs this year. Our first album is already in the end-phase of its production and we will soon post more information about it on this website.

item.title: New website
item.description: After long silence we present you our new Homepagedesign! Don’t forget to check out our brand new forum and the sample from this year’s studiowork. Better keep your eyes open…maybe there will be some special news around soon.

item.title: New man on bass
item.description: We thank all of you who supported us at Pagenfest yesterday! We did not expect such a great acceptance. Thanks to all of you! All of you who joined us yesterday at Pagenfest allready now it, Heathen Foray has a new man on bass. We welcome our new bandmember Markus Wildinger!

item.title: Paganfest
item.description: On 20th of April we support ENSIFERUM, MOONSORROW, KORPIKLAANI,TYR and ELUVEITIE at Graz (Orpheum) on their Pagan Fest Tour. Get the last tickets! info@heathenforay.com To celebrate this with you we put a new song from our Demo “Forest” in the page for download!

item.title: Northern Lights cancelled
item.description: The location for our gig on the 29th March was moved to the “DIAVOLO” in Graz. Furthermore, we have to tell you that we will not be playing at this year’s Northern Lights Festival because is was canceled by the organizer. For a detailled explanation please check the NLF website.

item.title: New gig
item.description: We have a bunch of new infos for you! On the 29th March we will rock with Rest in Fear, Project Anima and Agonys Despair the WIST (Moserhofgasse) in Graz! The location of the Northern Lights Festival was moved to the Burgruine Ruttenstein (OÖ)!

item.title: Forest release on September 1st
item.description: After long silence we have new news for you. As you might know we spent the last months on working onour first demo record. “Forest” will be out in September and will contain 4 songs. And keep your eyes on the 1st September!

item.title: Audience choice in Linz
item.description: We are back from Linz! Heathen Foray reached most of the audiencevotes with a total number of 61. However, we were not allowed to proceed to the semifinals. You cannot understand the rating system of the Metalchamp-contest? Well, we cannot either.

item.title: Back in the studio
item.description: Heathen Foray will rock the Arcadium Graz together with EQUILIBRIUM, Interregnum and Midgard. Date will be anounced soon! We are also pleased to say that we continued our work on our CD a few weeks ago. So stay tuned for some updates!

item.title: Second place!
item.description: Heathen Foray played the Orpheum Newcomer Bandcontestâ€œ last sunday. We reached the 2nd place of the audience-voting with 82 votes! We just came 7 votes after the 1st place. Therefore we won’t be playing the next round of the contest. We want to thank all our friends and families that supported us so well. Through your support it feels like a victory to us! Our special thanks go to our friends of Arctic Light, Contra/Verse and Interregnum who supported us throughout the show.

item.title: Safet leaves
item.description: Our Guitarist Safet has left Heathen Foray! Safet decided to attempt his musical future without Heathen Foray. We wish him all the best in his future. It is a great honor for us to announce that there is a new member in Heathen Foray. Bernd Zahn will undertake the guitars! There are also some new Promo/Rehersalpics in our MEDIA section available!

item.title: Metalchamp
item.description: Heathen Foray is now a part of Europe´s leading battle for metal bands! www.metalchamp.org New Live-Dates are coming soon!

item.title: Demo release postponed
item.description: First of all, we have some bad news: We were not able to enter the studio this January because of some private issues . So the DEMO Release will be postponed to the end of March. We are confident that it will be ready till then. And now some good news: Heathen Foray will be playing some gigs this spring. Exact dates are not fixed by now but we will let you know on our homepage as soon as they are fixed.

item.title: Demo release postponed
item.description: You can now access our webshop! So it is possible for you now to order “Forest” via our homepage.

item.title: On the battlefield
item.description: We are sorry to inform you that Rigor Mortis can’t play at the “On the Battlefield” festival in Deutschlandsberg. Nevertheless the organisators found a more than fitting replacement. Verreck Attack will perfom instead of Rigor Mortis. We are looking forward to see you on the 9th of December!

item.title: First gig
item.description: First of all we want to thank you for the wonderful feedback on our homepage! A lot of people asked us for samples of our songs. Unfortunately you have to wait till the turn of the year. After that we will enter the studio a record our first Demo CD. There will be of course some samples for you on our homepage! The reason why we cannot record the songs earlier is our first liveperformance on the 12th of December at the SUBWAY Deutschlandsberg.

item.title: Website online
item.description: HeathenForay.com goes online! Keep on checking back for updates. There will be a lot of updates soon!
